8.3
```{r}
ggplot(CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=sex))
```
```{r}
ggplot(CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=sex)) +
  facet_wrap(~married,ncol=1)
```
```{r}
ggplot(CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=sex)) +
  ylim(0,30)
```

```{r}
diamonds %>%
  group_by(color) %>%
  summarise(size = mean(carat)) %>%
  arrange(desc(size)) %>%
  head(1)
```

```{r}

  group_by(clarity) %>%
  summarise(table = mean(table)) %>%
  arrange(desc(table)) %>%
  head(1)
```
